sentence: Disney has faced other ridicule lately, namely from Florida Governor Ron DeSantis regarding the "Don't Say Gay" law.
author: Nick Mordowanec
title: Tweet Accuses Disney of 'Pure Greed' Thanks to Movie Screening Rules
